name: Rascal Racoon
description:
Rascal Raccoon is on a mission to steal the treasure chest from the heavily guarded castle! In this fast-paced runner game, you play as Rascal Raccoon and must jump, slide, and dodge obstacles to make it to the castle and steal the treasure chest.

With no special abilities or traps, you must rely on your quick reflexes and precise timing to navigate through the level filled with jumping platforms. Be careful not to fall off the platforms or hit any obstacles, or Rascal Raccoon will lose a life.

As you progress through the level, the speed increases, making it even more challenging to reach the castle and steal the treasure chest. Can you help Rascal Raccoon succeed in his mission and become the greatest thief in the land?
